item.title: Research
item.description: My research was on the characterization of SIDS rules through modifications. Once the paper is published, it will be posted on this website as well. Publication is currently pending.
item.content: My research was on the characterization of SIDS rules through modifications. Once the paper is published, it will be posted on this website as well. Publication is currently pending.

item.title: Socials
item.description: You can find me on any of the socials below. For the fastest response, use the email listed on my resume. LinkedIn Twitter GitHub Resume
item.content:

item.title: Projects
item.description: As I finish projects I will post links to them here. My first project (pending release) is a Python package.
